titleStmt.title: E. S. Dunster to James F. Robinson
CWG12061

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 1st - 20th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Primary Source Documents

body.p:
2 Inf 1
Surgeon General's Office
Washington City, D.C.
May 15th 1863

Sir,
Official notification has been received at this office, of the following vacancies in regiments from your State.
Asst. Surg 2nd Ky. vice W. L. Reed, resigned March 11th 1863
" " 6th " " E. T. Long " " 1863
It is desirable that such of these vacancies as still exist, be filled as soon as may be consistent with the interests of the service.

Very respectfully
Your obedient servant.
By order of the Surgeon General.
E S Dunster
Asst. Surgeon U.S. Army

His Excellency
James F. Robinson.
Governor of Kentucky.
Frankfort. Kentucky.
